originalText.text: My partner and I personally highly recommends Steven Hoffner law firm . He communicate with you ever step of the way , he has such a humble and patient personality that works well cause I am over thinker and  anxious so I am always asking questions . He work our case very well , the truth came forth by Mr Hoffner knowledgable and professional legal skill and my partner was exonerated on all 6counts on a criminal case so I am personally greatful to him ,and his hard work . what Steven Hoffner law firm provide is hard to find these days , personable and great customer service .

originalText.text: Please do not hire this man… it is a waste of a retainer fee he doesn’t keep up with his cases, is not a good negotiator and is a very negative lawyer who does not want to try to speak up for his clients even if they’re innocent. Hiring him is like hiring a bad public defender.
